changeSet.comment: Create KPI configuration for B.8 module - API Integration compliance
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ${database.defaultSchemaName}.KPI_CONFIGURATION ( CO_ID, CO_MODULE_ID, FL_EXCLUDE_PLANNED_SHUTDOWN, FL_EXCLUDE_UNPLANNED_SHUTDOWN, CO_ELIGIBILITY_THRESHOLD, CO_TOLERANCE, CO_AVERAGE_TIME_LIMIT, TE_EVALUATION_TYPE ) SELECT NEXTVAL('SQ${project_name}_KPICONF'), m.CO_ID, false, false, 0.0, 1.0, null, 'TOTALE' FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.MODULE m WHERE m.TE_CODE = 'B.8';
